Summary: outside looking nortj and to the wrst bright light apperead low in sky when to tje east until out of sight
divs: Sighting DetailsOn the 11th of august I was in my front yard looking at the stars. I was facing north and to the west a bright white orb,sphere just appeared. It was real bright thats why i noticed it. No noise came from it when it moved threw the sky about the speed of a plane and was definitely lower in altitude than a plane. It was travel in to the east about 45' in the sky. So I took my camera on my phone and turned the flash to its highest and point it and captured two pictures.then it went out of sight due to horizon. I don't know what it is but I do know I have seen similar thing(s) for the past 2years off and on. I was super excited when I seen it and really excited when I took the pictures. But when I got inside much later and looked at my pictures I was in shock in what was got in both photos. To me I think they are 2 of the best pictures of a UFO I have ever seen and people I show say and believe the same.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Union
This sighting has never been favorited.
